Summary Note:
The RM first met López Sánchez Martínez at a wine tasting event in Madrid. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
López Sánchez Martínez is a 54 year old Billionaire Investor from Spain. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: López Sánchez Martínez and Concha have been married since 1998. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
López earned his secondary school diploma from IES Juan Carlos I Burgos in 1989.
López attended ESADE Business & Law School and graduated in 1995.
Moreover he completed his extra university education at University of Granada in 1998.
Occupation History:
López Sánchez Martínez is a 54 year old Billionaire Investor from Spain.
López Sánchez Martínez launched his career as a Investment Banker at Bankia S.A., where he gained valuable experience from 1994 to 1995.
In 1996, he moved to Bankia S.A. to work as a Private Equity Investor, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2001 to 2004, he served as a Hedge Fund Manager at BBVA S.A., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
His next role was as a Venture Capitalist at BBVA S.A., where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 2005 to 2009.
Since joining Banco Santander S.A. as a Billionaire Investor in 2011, he has established himself as a respected authority, fostering collaboration and pushing boundaries to achieve groundbreaking results.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 710000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns flat in Almería, where he resides. It is worth 840000 EUR.


Following the passing of his father, a successful Stock Trader, he received an inheritance of 120000 EUR in 2012, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
